Robert M Williams

Designer // Creator // Dreamer

Myself in A Nutshell

With an eagerness to learn and a willingness to always do more, I am always the first and last person through the door. Beach lover by day and cocktail bar by night, I come across as a talk able and friendly person – with a slight OCD personality, or so I’m told.

A quick leaner, with a methodical mind-set and a slightly over-active imagination. Spontaneous personality with a love for the outdoors, my biggest flaw would be always trying to over think/do things – be it design or programming, I often find myself having to hold myself back and to remember to ‘K.I.S.S'

Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you
want to do with your life, be passionate.

Jon BonJovi
